title: Bloomberg Law: Robinson on Emoluments Clause (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law: Robinson on Emoluments Clause (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Kimberly Robinson, a Bloomberg BNA Supreme Court reporter discusses the emoluments clause of the U.S. Constitution. She speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
